name: Yugo
title: The Wolf Warrior
subtitle: A powerful fighter who can transform between human and wolf forms
lore: A skilled warrior with the ability to transform into a fearsome wolf, Yugo combines the strength and technique of his human form with the raw power and ferocity of his beast form. His unique ability to switch between forms makes him an unpredictable opponent who can adapt to any situation. Despite his bestial nature, he fights to protect those who cannot protect themselves.

passive.name: Beast Gauge
passive.description: Yugo has a Beast Gauge that fills up when dealing damage(+5), receiving damage(+7), and killing minions(+2) scoring takedowns(+20). The gauge can be filled to a maximum of 100 points. Transforming into wolf form consumes any points of the gauge, with the duration of the transformation proportional to the amount of the gauge consumed (0.5 seconds per 1 points). Yugo gains 5% lifesteal in human form and 10% lifesteal in wolf form.

Q.name: Crushing Blow / Savage Claw
Q.description:
Crushing Blow (Human): Yugo punches the target enemy, dealing [60/95/190/270/320] damage and reducing their armor by [15%] for [4] seconds.
Savage Claw (Wolf): Yugo bites the target, dealing [95/160/300/400/515 + (10%AD)] damage and applying a bleed that deals [5%AD] over 4 seconds and also reveals the target for the duration.

W.name: Hunter's Speed / Wolf's Pounce
W.description:
Hunter's Speed (Human): Yugo gains [20%] increased movement speed for [3] seconds. If he moves towards enemy champions, the movement speed bonus is increased to [50%].
Wolf's Pounce (Wolf): Yugo leaps to a target location, dealing [200%AD] damage and slowing enemies by [30%] for [2] seconds. Biting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this ability by [3] seconds.

E.name: Transform
E.description: Yugo transforms into his wolf form for a duration based on the Beast Gauge consumed. Upon transforming, enemies around him are feared for [0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5] second.

R.name: Beast Rampage
R.description:
Human Form: Yugo goes into a berserk state, gaining [0.5/0.9/1.1] attack speed and [15%] lifesteal for [7] seconds. During this time, he generates double the Beast Gauge points.
Wolf Form: Yugo unleashes his full power, increasing his attack damage by [180/280/350], attack speed by [0.5/0.9/1.1], and movement speed by [15%] for [7] seconds. Each attack heals him for [15%] of the damage dealt.

1.name: Resilience
1.description: Crushing Blow reduces the target's damage to Yugo by [13/14/14/17/18%] for [2] seconds.

1.name: Speed Demon
1.description: Hunter's Speed duration is increased by [3/5/5/5/5] second.

1.name: Enhanced Lifesteal
1.description: Yugo's passive lifesteal is increased by [7%] in both forms.

5.name: Frenzied Strikes
5.description: Savage Claw's bleed duration is increased by [3] seconds.

5.name: Fearsome Leap
5.description: Wolf's Pounce also fears enemies for 0.5 seconds.

5.name: Rapid Transformation
5.description: Transform generates a shield for [3] seconds that absorbs [130/270/550/800/995] damage.

10.name: Powerful Rampage
10.description: Both forms gain the stat changing effects of each form.

10.name: Extended Rampage
10.description: Beast Rampage duration is increased by [2] seconds, 1 second bonus for each takedown while the duration lasts.

15.name: Bloodlust Frenzy
15.description: Yugo's lifesteal is increased by [5%] when his HP is below [16%].

15.name: Beastly Endurance
15.description: Wolf Form grants Yugo [5%] damage reduction.

15.name: Powerful Human
15.description: Human form gains the basic and scaling stats of Wolf Form.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: Beast Rampage halves crowd control effects for the duration.

20.name: Alpha Predator
20.description: Yugo is always in Wolf form.

20.name: Relentless Hunter
20.description: Yugo runs [200%] faster in bushes when he is in wolf form.

20.name: Feeding the Beast
20.description: Nearby teammates can charge Yugo's gauge as well. Yugo gains half of the original bonuses.
